text: Philadelphus (? – 217) is referred to as the first bishop of Byzantium after the eight-year administration of the Church of Byzantium by a priest whose name has not been recorded. He was bishop for six years (211–217). ==Sources== *Οικουμενικό Πατριαρχείο Category:3rd-century people from Byzantium Category:Bishops of Byzantium
title: Philadelphus of Byzantium
